Title: Relates to a fare program which caps the amount of fares charged to riders during an applicable time period
Summary: Directs the MTA to establish a fare program which caps the amount of fares charged to riders during an applicable time period at the amount which represents the value of an unlimited fare card for the same time period.
LawCode: Amd ยง1266, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to directing the establishment of a fare program which caps the amount of fares charged to riders during an applicable time period
